articles.content:

articles.title: Women's Six Nations: France make it two wins from two by overpowering Ireland 40-5 - BBC
articles.description: France continue their successful start to the Women's Six Nations by overpowering Ireland 40-5 in Toulouse to make it two wins from two.
articles.content:
Women's Six Nations: France v Ireland
France (26) 40
Tries: Llorens, Sansus 2, Forlani, Joyeux, Boulard Cons: Drouin, Tremouliere Pens: Drouin 2
